doc.summary: A <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/level/block/entity/BlockEntity">BlockEntity</ref> used with <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/tile/BlockBE">BlockBE</ref> can implement this.
doc.text: A <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/level/block/entity/BlockEntity">BlockEntity</ref> used with <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/tile/BlockBE">BlockBE</ref> can implement this. Then a <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/level/block/entity/BlockEntityTicker">BlockEntityTicker</ref> to  tick the block entity will be created.
